titleStmt.title: A further account of the province of Pennsylvania and its improvements for the satisfaction of those that are adventurers, and enclined to be so.
titleStmt.author: Penn, William, 1644-1718.

notesStmt.note: Signed: William Penn. Worminghurst-place, 12th of the 10th month 85.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
